ygData.subject: RE: Jboots, Rubi & Beyond
ygData.msgSnippet: Shaman quests for new armor ARE going in, MAYBE not this next patch, but there are reports that it s on the Test Server now. The quests will be given out by
ygData.messageBody:
Shaman quests for new armor ARE going in, MAYBE not this next patch, but
there are reports that it's on the Test Server now. The quests will be given
out by two of the barbs in the Barb fishing village (not sure which one) in
Lake Rathe.

I have heard that druids will NOT be getting new stuff. They didn't loose it
with Rubi anyways. *shrug* I think Verant likes Druids less than Shamans ;-)

-----Original Message-----
From: Sithrin [mailto:sithrin@...]
Sent: October 11, 1999 2:34 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Jboots, Rubi & Beyond


From: "Sithrin" <sithrin@...>

Has anyone heard anything about the druid or shaman quests for armor? Or if
there even ARE any?

Just curious -

Sithrin
